https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs.title: View Transition API - Web APIs | MDN
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs.description: The View Transition API provides a mechanism for easily creating animated transitions between different website views. This includes animating between DOM states in a single-page app (SPA), and animating the navigation between documents in a multi-page app (MPA).

https://docs.astro.build/en/guides/view-.title: View transitions | Docs
https://docs.astro.build/en/guides/view-.description: Enable seamless navigation between pages in Astro with view transitions.
